Class UserProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.UserProfile

extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to create and store user's profiles.

    Andy Kuo

      • UserProfile

        public UserProfile(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   int levelProg)
        Creates a new user profile.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the profile.
        password - The password of the profile.
        levelProg - What level they have made it to.

    • Method Detail

      • deleteUserProfile

        public static void deleteUserProfile(java.lang.String username,
                                     java.lang.String password,
                                     int levelProg)
        Deletes the user profile. Requires there user name, password and level progress to delete.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the profile.
        password - The password of the file.
        levelProg - There level progress in the game.

      • updateUserProfile

        public static void updateUserProfile(java.lang.String initialName,
                                     java.lang.String username,
                                     java.lang.String password,
                                     int levelProg)
        Updates the user profile Uses initialName to find the profile and enter the new information in to change.
        Parameters:
        initialName - The name before the change.
        username - The new user name of the profile.
        password - The new password for the profile.
        levelProg - The updated level progress.

      • createUserProfile

        public static boolean createUserProfile(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String password,
                                        int levelProg)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Used to create a new user profile, used in the title screen.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the profile.
        password - The password of the profile.
        levelProg - The level progress made by the user.
        Returns:
        True if the user already exists else False.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Tells the system that this method could cause an error whereby the file cannot be located.
